sections.heading: A blurb about meâ€¦
paragraphs: I began my journey into webdev last year through a remote program at perpetual education and have come to gain a passion for it
Im currently a computer science student as well, and really its reaffirmed my love for the prettier side of things.
Im a big fan of storytelling, in all its forms books, conversations and people.
i hope to get good enough at this to one day tell a story through a website.
